title: The Bathtub Mystery
description: In this Dateline classic, Ryan and Sarah are newlyweds of just 114 days. Home together on a quiet Monday evening, no one could ever imagine how their lives would soon take a turn for the worst. Dennis Murphy reports. Originally aired on NBC on May 6, 2011.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
